mapper.sql: ACNT_OID, ACNT_DESC, ACNT_TYPE, BALANCE, QUOTA, DEBT, OWNER_OID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, SEQ_NO
mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT
SEQ_NO = SEQ_NO + 1,
ACNT_DESC = #{acntDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ACNT_TYPE = #{acntType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUOTA = #{quota,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEBT = #{debt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OWNER_OID = #{ownerOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
WHERE ACNT_OID = #{acntOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE ACCOUNT SET SEQ_NO = SEQ_NO + 1, ACNT_DESC = #{acntDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ACNT_TYPE = #{acntType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUOTA = #{quota,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEBT = #{debt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OWNER_OID = #{ownerOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} WHERE ACNT_OID = #{acntOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT ACNT_OID, ACNT_DESC, ACNT_TYPE, BALANCE, QUOTA, DEBT, OWNER_OID, USER_NAME FROM ACCOUNT, USER_PROFILE WHERE ACCOUNT.OWNER_OID = USER_PROFILE.USER_OID

SELECT A.ACNT_OID, ACNT_DESC, ACNT_TYPE, BALANCE, QUOTA, DEBT, OWNER_OID, AMOUNT AS PAYMENT, U.USER_NAME FROM ACCOUNT A, ACCOUNT_CONSUMPTION B, USER_PROFILE U WHERE A.ACNT_OID = B.ACNT_OID AND A.OWNER_OID = U.USER_OID AND B.CPN_OID = #{cpnOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT A.ACNT_OID, ACNT_DESC, ACNT_TYPE, BALANCE, QUOTA, DEBT, OWNER_OID, U.USER_NAME FROM ACCOUNT A, ACCOUNT_INCOMING B, USER_PROFILE U WHERE A.ACNT_OID = B.ACNT_OID AND A.OWNER_OID = U.USER_OID AND B.INCOMING_OID = #{incomingOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
